extendedInfo.description: 1SaleADay is the premier site for finding great Daily Deals at up to 90% off! Donât let the name fool you: in addition to having 5 unique deals running each day on our Main, Wireless, Watch, Family, and Jewelry tabs, you will find a veritable treasure chest of deals in our members-only Flash section. The key to finding truly great deals is to always stay in the loop; with this in mind, we bring you the official 1SaleADay Mobile App for Android devices. Download the 1SaleADay App and each day a slew of new opportunities will find their way to your mobile device. From toys to technology, housewares to fine jewelry, our app has something for everyone. With it, you can: * View all of our daily deals, including our Main, Wireless, Watch, Family, Jewelry & Flash Deals. * Share the daily deals with friends and family via email & social media. * Add deals to your cart and checkout without leaving the app! * Pay for your orders using credit cards and PayPal. * Access your order history complete with shipping address and payment method. Extended Features: * Create a 1SaleADay Account. * Push Notifications * Deals are refreshed every day at 12:00 AM ET. * Have a question? Contact our friendly customer service agents from your mobile device. Download the 1SaleADay app today and never pay full price again.For all fans of 1SaleADay.com, daily deals, and great bargain shopping!

reviews.title: Free
reviews.comment: Are you really giving stuff.  Everytime I checkout the final screen says\" wrong number (2for1)\".  What the heck does that mean?
reviews.author: Leah Small

reviews.title: Wrong numbers (2 of 1)
reviews.comment: That\'s the only message I get when I try ordering anything :/  once this is fixed I will change the rating.
reviews.author: Taneisha L

reviews.title: Buggy app
reviews.comment: I like the idea of this app, but lately it isn\'t working correctly.  I tap on items, but it does nothing.
reviews.author: Trent Fordham

reviews.title: Not many \"must have items\"
reviews.comment: There are bugs many, today there was an item that was like-66% so inserted of paying like 20 it was like 30 like wtf. Please add more expensive items....
reviews.author: David Biel

reviews.title: Hoorible. Doesnt work
reviews.comment: App crashes a lot, sometimes it doesnt even open, takes forever to load the items. Its horrible
reviews.author: Jonathan Valle

reviews.title: Needs a widget
reviews.comment: I haven\'t bought anything yet so I can\'t speak on the checkout process but if you want me to know daily what you\'ve got, the best way is to give me a widget on my screen so that I\'ll see if I want the deal. Otherwise I\'m not going to remember to look daily, and probably will miss something good. Like the nook hd the other day:(
reviews.author: Bridget H.

reviews.title: Decent App but needs work.
reviews.comment: This is a decent app but when adding multiple items of different types to my cart, it just adds multiples of the first item added in checkout. A simple but tedious work around is to just order one item at a time, but that\'s rather time consuming. Until that gets fixed, the website is easier to use. Galaxy Note II.
reviews.author: Ronnie Morgan

reviews.comment: If it worked, it would be great. But that\'s not even close to happening.\tThe app is bugged beyond belief; mobile ordering either alters your cart to include different items, or won\'t let you order at all. The app is absolutely useless, use the site to do anything you need to.
reviews.author: Brittin Kellar

reviews.title: Crashes!
reviews.comment: Keeps crashing every time I select an item to view. They stopped emailing me long ago even though I didn\'t ask to. Bad support, bad app, bad company! Started decent but went downhill! Ordered many times in past, probably not again.
reviews.author: Charles Jones

reviews.title: Works fine
reviews.comment: Works well enough but could the pictures in the lists be bigger please of the products?
reviews.author: Ian Carnegie

reviews.title: Rarely works
reviews.comment: I love this website and thought the app would be a convenient way of shopping. Wrong! The app hardly ever works, I click on a sale I\'m interested in only nothing happens. Hopefully they fix this.
reviews.author: Kristin Banas

reviews.title: Love the site.
reviews.comment: I shop for Christmas all year long and save a ton of money and time!
reviews.author: JuliAnna MullinsWarren

reviews.title: Shouldn\'t even created the app.
reviews.comment: Try to purchase something and get through all the shipping details only to come up with a bogus error message.  Why come out with the app if you can\'t use it? Too many bugs.
reviews.author: Tim Syoen

reviews.title: Can\'t check out
reviews.comment: I love seeing the updated sales on my phone, but there\'s no use in having the app without being able to to buy anything!!! I cant see the information or type anything. App sucks; site\'s fantastic.
reviews.author: Jessica Dellagatta

reviews.title: ZERO STARS. STAY AWAY
reviews.comment: This app IS TRASH. DOES NOT WORK.. PERIOD. STAY AWAY
reviews.author: Adam Williams

reviews.comment: Love this site. Look at it daily! Great items quick shipping
reviews.author: Kayla Ardoin

reviews.title: Good app doesn\'t always work
reviews.comment: Love the sales! But often won\'t let me click on items to view or purchase
reviews.author: Jennifer Lewis
